com.iplanet.am.sdk

Interface AMResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AMConstants, AMObject
    Deprecated. 
    As of Sun Java System Access Manager 7.1.

    public interface AMResource
extends AMObject
    This interface provides methods to manage user. AMResource objects can be obtained by using AMStoreConnection. A handle to this object can be obtained by using the DN of the object. 
     
 AMStoreConnection amsc = new AMStoreConnection(ssotoken); if
 (amsc.doesEntryExist(rDN)) { AMResource res = amsc.getResource(rDN); }

    • Method Detail

      • activate

        void activate()
       throws AMException,
              SSOException
        Deprecated. 
        Activates the user.
        Throws:
        AMException - if an error is encountered when trying to access/retrieve data from the data store
        SSOException - if the single sign on token is no longer valid

         throws AMException,
